snippet: The candidate Mohammad Reza Aref’s decision to pull out of this week’s presidential election is seen as a boost for Hassan Rowhani, who now faces five conservative candidates in the vote on Friday.
abstract: Mohammad Reza Aref, Iranian pro-reform candidate, drops out of country's presidential election to support centrist Hassan Rouhani.
lead_paragraph: The candidate Mohammad Reza Aref’s decision to pull out of this week’s presidential election is seen as a boost for Hassan Rowhani, who now faces five conservative candidates in the vote on Friday.

headline.main: Iran: Reformist Candidate Withdraws to Aid Centrist’s Presidential Campaign
headline.print_headline: Iran: Reformist Candidate Withdraws To Aid Centrist’s Presidential Campaign
